name: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P.
description: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. is a publicly traded master limited partnership focused on the transportation, storage, and marketing of crude oil and natural gas liquids. Founded in 1998 and headquartered in Houston, Texas, Plains operates an extensive network of pipelines and facilities across North America, primarily serving the oil and gas industry. The company plays a critical role in the energy supply chain, providing vital midstream services that connect producers with consumers. Plains All American is committed to operational excellence and safety, maintaining high standards in environmental stewardship and regulatory compliance. The company’s diverse asset base includes pipelines, terminals, and storage facilities, enhancing its capability to respond to market demands and customer needs. Plains also engages in logistics and marketing services, helping clients optimize their supply chains and manage logistics effectively. With a strong focus on sustainability, Plains is investing in technology and practices that aim to reduce the environmental impact of its operations while continuing to support the energy needs of the North American market.

seo.meta_title: Plains All American Pipeline, L.P. | Energy Infrastructure Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Plains All American Pipeline, L.P., a leader in energy infrastructure providing essential transportation, storage, and marketing services for crude oil and natural gas liquids.

faq.question: What services does Plains All American provide?
faq.answer: Plains All American provides transportation, storage, and marketing services for crude oil and natural gas liquids.

faq.question: Where is Plains All American headquartered?
faq.answer: Plains All American is headquartered in Houston, Texas, USA.

faq.question: When was Plains All American founded?
faq.answer: Plains All American was founded in 1998.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Plains All American?
faq.answer: Willie Chiang is the CEO of Plains All American Pipeline, L.P.
